from itms_project_version where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.delete: update itms_project_version set is_deleted = 'Y', update_by = #{updateBy},update_time = NOW() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
